law.catch_line: Unless authorized under this title to provide real estate appraisal services, a person may not repre...
law.text: Unless authorized under this title to provide real estate appraisal services, a person may not represent to the public, by use of a title, including "licensed real estate appraiser", by description of services, methods, or procedures, or otherwise, that the person is authorized to provide real estate appraisal services in the State.
